item.description:
** Yes, we're still playing tonight :) **

Just a reminder:

We play scoreless, non-aggressive, laid-back Ultimate Frisbee in the dark! Anyone of any age or level of experience is welcome. Please bring a hat and gloves and a light-colored shirt, if you have one. Questions? Comments? Email any of our organizers.

There is free parking (see images) off of Rindge Avenue. Also, the Alewife T Station is a few hundred yards away, as is the 83 bus.


http://www.bostonfris...


http://www.bostonfris...

Click here to see a full Google map of the area. Also, should you decide to take the red line to Alewife, board the last car on the train; that way, when you get off, you'll be right next to the stairs to Russell Field.

After playing we'll either go out to a restaurant for food and drinks or go to someone's house for post-frisbee festivities. Hope you'll make it out with us!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be siting on the bench alongside the football field or throwing an illuminated frisbee.
item.why: We're awesome! Come get some exercise...
item.name: Russell Field Beckons Illuminated Frisbee
